She was also the most banned brawler in monthly finals. Lumi is so good because of her versatility. You can use her attacks to control areas on map and dictate play. Her super is also very good in shutting down aggression and confirming easy kills. Her gadgets and star powers are also very strong. Lumi is good on pretty much every mode, but don't always pick her in knockout and bounty. And Kenji is the best brawler in Brawl Stars. Kenji recently received his hypercharge and it is completely broken. Even if you don't kill the enemy with the hypercharge super, you spawn right on them and then finish them off easily. Kenji's main attack does a lot of damage and you can use it to dash to the enemy and chase them. His survivability is also insane because he heals up whenever he deals damage. When playing Kenji, you want to play very aggressive to charge your hypercharge quicker. target low DPS brawlers because Kenji plays well into them. Kenji is best on fast-paced modes because he can cycle his supers and hypercharges easily. These modes are Brawl Ball, Hot Zone, and Gem Grab. Kenji is an insane brawler right now and definitely the best in the game. And that is the 10 best brawlers in Brawl Stars.
